HomeHero.subtitle: Find a company for the evening

HomeFeatures.subtitle: Everything for comfortable and safe communication

security.title: Security
security.description: Verified profiles and moderation system. Your safety is our priority.

fast.title: Fast
fast.description: Find company in a few minutes. No long questionnaires and waiting.

byInterests.title: By interests
byInterests.description: Filters by age, interests and location. Find exactly who you need.

chat.title: Convenient chat
chat.description: Built-in messenger for communication. Discuss plans and arrange a meeting.

nearby.title: Nearby
nearby.description: Search for company in your city or area. Meet where it's convenient for both of you.

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.description: Rating and review system. Choose verified users.

HomeHowItWorks.subtitle: Just a few steps to a meeting

registration.title: Registration
registration.description: Quick registration via social networks or email. Specify your interests and preferences.

search.title: Search
search.description: Use filters to find suitable company. Age, interests, location - choose yourself.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: Write to the person you're interested in. Discuss evening plans and arrange a meeting.

meeting.title: Meeting
meeting.description: Spend an unforgettable evening together! After the meeting, you can leave a review.

HomeSecurity.title: Security first
HomeSecurity.subtitle: We care about your safety

verification.title: Verification
verification.description: Profile verification and content moderation. We work only with adult users.

dataProtection.title: Data protection
dataProtection.description: Your personal data is securely protected. We use modern encryption methods.

complaints.title: Complaint system
complaints.description: Fast response system for complaints. Violators are blocked instantly.

ratings.title: Ratings
ratings.description: Review and rating system helps you choose verified users.

andrey.text: Great service! Found company for the evening in half an hour. Everything went great, I'll definitely come back again.
andrey.name: Andrew, 48

maxim.text: Convenient search and filters. Quickly found suitable company. The service really works as it should.
maxim.name: Max, 28

ksenia.text: Safe and convenient. The rating system helps choose verified people. I recommend!
ksenia.name: Ksenia, 23

Contacts.metaTitle: Contacts Friends4Evening | Meeting and Communication Service
Contacts.metaDescription: Ways to contact Friends4Evening service, company information, feedback form, our social networks and frequently asked questions
Contacts.title: Contacts
Contacts.subtitle: Contact us if you have questions or suggestions

values.name: LOVIGIN LTD
values.address: 86-90 Paul Street London EC2A 4NE, United Kingdom

support.question: How to contact support?
support.answer: You can write to us at Friends4Evening@lovigin.com or contact us through the feedback form. We try to respond within 24 hours.

report.question: How to report a violation?
report.answer: If you encounter a violation of the rules of conduct, please use the "Report" button in the user's profile or write to us by email with a description of the situation.

suggestions.question: How to suggest a service improvement?
suggestions.answer: We are always happy to hear your suggestions! Write to us by email or fill out the feedback form with a description of your idea, and we will definitely consider it.

messages.success: ‚úì Message sent! We will contact you soon.
messages.error: ‚úó An error occurred. Please try again or contact us directly by email.
